# Saren.ai

> Saren Sakurai — Fractional CMO and AI operations consultant for early-stage and Series A companies.

## About

Saren Sakurai builds AI-powered growth systems that turn chaotic marketing spend into predictable revenue. He works as a fractional CMO for founders who need pipeline, not process — from demand generation to full-funnel attribution.

## Services

- Fractional CMO engagements for early-stage and Series A startups
- AI-driven marketing operations and automation
- Demand generation strategy and execution
- Full-funnel attribution and analytics
- B2B SaaS messaging and positioning
- Content systems and buyer journey design
- Behavioral lead scoring and sales enablement

## Notable Results

- 344% inbound lift and 70% CAC reduction (Qwiet AI)
- 550% pipeline growth (Cylance, $1.4B exit)
- Built the "Collaborative AI" category (WethosAI, Series A)
- $4M quarterly pipeline via 120-day content system (Cylance)

## Portfolio

Interactive case studies and frameworks:

- [Golden Dashboard](/portfolio/golden-dashboard): Full-funnel attribution analytics
- [Sovereign Buyer Personas](/portfolio/sovereign-personas): Committee buying persona framework
- [10-Touch Sales Play](/portfolio/10-touch-sales-play): Multi-channel prospecting system
- [120-Day Content Journey](/portfolio/120-day-content-journey): Demand engineering content system
- [B2B Marketing Framework](/portfolio/b2b-marketing-framework): 7-layer SaaS messaging framework
- [Behavioral Lead Scoring](/portfolio/behavioral-lead-scoring): Engagement and sales readiness scoring
- [SaaS Revenue Calculator](/portfolio/calculator): Reverse-engineer funnel metrics from revenue targets
- [It's Good to Be Pitched](/portfolio/its-good-to-be-pitched): AI-assisted creative production demo
